argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zrhcofipsgn.p | |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) |
| 2 |  | zrhcofipsgn.y | |- Y = ( ZRHom ` R ) |
| 3 |  | zrhcofipsgn.s | |- S = ( pmSgn ` N ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( SymGrp ` N ) = ( SymGrp ` N ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- { p e. P | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } = { p e. P | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } |
| 6 | 4, 1, 5, 3 | #P_psgnfn | |- S Fn { p e. P | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. P ) -> Q e. P ) |
| 8 | 4, 1 | #P_sygbasnfpfi | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. P ) -> dom ( Q \ _I ) e. Fin ) |
| 9 |  | #P_difeq1 | |- ( p = Q -> ( p \ _I ) = ( Q \ _I ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( p = Q -> dom ( p \ _I ) = dom ( Q \ _I ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( p = Q -> ( dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin <-> dom ( Q \ _I ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_elrab | |- ( Q e. { p e. P | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } <-> ( Q e. P /\ dom ( Q \ _I ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 8, 12 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. P ) -> Q e. { p e. P | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fvco2 | |- ( ( S Fn { p e. P | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } /\ Q e. { p e. P | dom ( p \ _I ) e. Fin } ) -> ( ( Y o. S ) ` Q ) = ( Y ` ( S ` Q ) ) ) |
| 15 | 6, 13, 14 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. P ) -> ( ( Y o. S ) ` Q ) = ( Y ` ( S ` Q ) ) ) |
